natural solution: The greatest common factor of $28z^{97}$ and $7z^{96}$ is $7z^{96}$.
We factor $7z^{96}$ out of both terms to get\begin{align} 28z^{97}+7z^{96} &= 7z^{96}\cdot 4z +7z^{96}\cdot 1\\ &= \boxed{7z^{96}(4z+1)}. \end{align}
